name: Neon Worms!
description:
Welcome to the Neon Abyss where you can create and customize your own worm! Collect coins to buy segments to help you survive and defeat enemies! Each segment has a price to pay in order to use it for your worm so choose wisely!

----------------------------------------------

Worm Creator(In case you need help with the creator):

  • The Creator has the shop at the top where a random selection of segments with a guaranteed head segment can be purchased. You can only buy one of each type of head segment.
  • Below the shop is your inventory. Here any segments you have bought will be placed in the slots where the amount is stored. The slot also shows the point cost for each segment.
  • And on the left is your Head slot. Here any head segment you buy will be stored here. Each Head has a different point cost total to allow you to add a certain number of segments
  • And finally to the right of that is your Worm body inventory. Here any segments that you selected from the inventory will be placed here to be taken to the level when ready. You can only add as much as the head's point total allows you to

----------------------------------------------

Made for the Juice  jam II!
